Class SerializableMapAssociationSnapshot

    public final class SerializableMapAssociationSnapshot
extends Object
implements AssociationSnapshot
    An AssociationSnapshot based on a serializable map.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard <emmanuel@hibernate.org>, Sanne Grinovero <sanne@hibernate.org> (C) 2011 Red Hat Inc., Gunnar Morling
